Text: The 9/11 Commission Report is a crock of shit. I'm not blaming the uploader, or the artists who made this book, but I'm sure this is about as factual as any marvel or dc title.

Hey gonadzz, thanks for checking out my uploads.

As I've stated previously, I have no political motivations when posting material of this sort (and I've posted stuff that leans heavily to both sides). Nor do I have any religious motivations when I post a string of books relating to Christianity. The impetus for my uploads is that they are NOT "any Marvel or DC" title. All of my uploads are purposely off the beaten track (unless it's a request that I've filled). It's cool if people dig 'em, and it's cool if people think they're a crock of shit. But the intention is never to start a political debate. TPB comic book section probably isn't the best place for that, really. Peace.

You always have the most interesting uploads. I love me some superhero books and zombie mags, but I like a lot of the "real life drama" comics you post and also the illustrated versions of books/documents. 

Thanks for posting this!
